description:
Kolk has created human weapons. Kolk plunges his glowing fingers into his own body and modifies himself before striking at Kenshiro.
"We seek to re-create the world!"
What are the thunderbolts of Migadol and re-creation Kolk mentioned in his final moments...?!
Meanwhile, Simeon Nagid appears before Erika. Yasaka tries to protect her, but he and Erika are kidnapped. And waiting for Erika was a shocking truth and Simeon`s horrifying plan...
Source: crunchyroll
